docs.title: Fider
docs.text: Fider is a feedback portal that helps you build better products. Give your customers a voice and let them tell you what they need. Spend less time guessing and more time building the right product.

docs.title: Access
docs.text: URL https://fider.tainton.uk   Hosted On netcup VPS   Monitored    SSO Enabled

docs.title: User Traffic Flow
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[User] --> B[Cloudflare];
  B --> C[Reverse Proxy];
  C --> D[Docker Container];

docs.title: Yaade
docs.text: Yaade is an open-source, self-hosted, collaborative API development environment.

docs.title: Access
docs.text: URL https://yaade.tainton.uk   Hosted On Synology NAS   Monitored    SSO Enabled  (EsperoTech/yaade#42)

  B --> C[Reverse Proxy];
